errors.generic-support-message: There was an unexpected error. Please try again later or contact support.
errors.check-all-fields: Check that you have filled in all the fields correctly
errors.min-invalid: The minimum value for this field is: {{min}}
errors.max-invalid: The maximum value for this field is: {{max}}
errors.min-length-invalid: The minimum length for this field is: {{min}}
errors.max-length-invalid: The maximum length for this field is: {{max}}
errors.tel-invalid: Please enter a valid phone number format
errors.regex-invalid: Please enter a valid REGEX expression
errors.pattern-invalid: The field must have the pattern {{pattern}}
errors.password-min-length: The password must contain at least {{minLength}} characters!
errors.password-number: The password must have at least a number!
errors.password-capital-case: The password should contain at least an uppercase character!
errors.password-small-case: The password must contain at least a lowercase character!
errors.password-special-character: The password must contain at least a special character!

form.upload-drag-file: Drag the file to upload it

404.title: Resource not found
404.description: Oops! The resource you are looking for was not found, go back to the homepage and use the menu to continue browsing.

403.title: Forbidden
403.description: You are not authorized to access this resource!

500.title: An error has occurred
500.description: There was an unexpected error. Please try again later or contact support.
